aboutMe.title: Innovative Developer

aboutMe.description: Hi, I'm Cansu. I'm a Full Stack Developer. On the frontend, I design user-friendly and visually appealing interfaces, while on the backend, I build reliable, scalable, and high-performance systems. I focus on delivering powerful and functional solutions using modern web technologies. If youâ€™d like to work with me on your projects, feel free to get in touch!

items.title: Java Script
items.description: Comprehensive knowledge and experience in JavaScript development. Expert in developing web applications.

items.title: React.js
items.description: Experienced in creating modern and scalable user interfaces using React.

items.description: Extensive experience in backend development with Node.js. API development and server management.

profile.title: Profile
profile.aboutMeText: Turning an idea into reality requires a solid technical foundation and effective collaboration. This is where I come in. I focus on bringing projects to life efficiently by prioritizing collaboration and transparent communication. By understanding user needs and business goals, I create a seamless frontend experience and a robust backend infrastructure. I work closely with clients throughout the process, incorporating feedback to ensure the best possible outcome.

items.title: Pizza Order
items.description: A customizable and user-friendly pizza ordering application built with React and Vite. Users can select sizes and toppings to create their orders. Includes form validation, API integration, and Cypress testing.

items.title: Frontend Challenge
items.description: A modern and customizable portfolio website built with React and Context API. Designed with Tailwind CSS for a fast and sleek UI. Showcases my projects and skills while providing an easy way for potential collaborators to get in touch.

items.title: Login Page
items.description: A simple yet functional login page built with React, featuring user authentication. Implements basic credential validation and offers a fast, user-friendly experience with its minimal design.
